timeline.message: Fixes for escaping json in the  "statements.sql"
Fix for reserved word in the statements.sql

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not sure about jq.
We need to change rest of the tutorial for people to install all required dependencies
timeline.author: gAmUssA
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 tr '\n' ' ' < src/statements.sql | \
 sed 's/;/;\'$'\n''/g' | \
 while read stmt; do
-    echo '{"ksql":"'$stmt'", "streamsProperties": {}}' | \
+    jq --arg value1 "$stmt" -n '{ "ksql" : $value1 }'| \

replies.bodyText: We were already requiring it. This change adds a second usage in the same script. We can follow up in another issue to cover jq as a prerequisite.
replies.author: colinhicks

replies.bodyText: We use jq in the current template @ templates/ksql/static/prod/code/send-to-api.sh.
replies.author: russau
